title: 'Good Soap but Bad Marketing'
body: 'The price of this product is misleading - MRP of ‚Çπ 304 is usually for a pack of 4 soaps of 125gms each. This pack contains only 3 soaps of 125 gms each for ‚Çπ268 - this cannot be described as a saving of 12%. Amazon should be more vigilant about pricing - otherwise customers will rightly doubt your integrity.'

title: 'Bakwas soap'
body: I didn't expect such a cheap product from pears. Soap breaks into pieces with usage of 3-4 days . You have to thrown remaining soap without using it.

title: 'Fragnance'
body: Scent is good no complaints, freshness is long lasting yes and the highlight is this Pears soap will not dry your skin after use for a good period of hours.  I would recommend to use the 'Pears Pomegranate' soap or body wash whichever is your preference. The Pears Pomegranate has an amazing fragrance and it will also last a long hours.  This product is good to buy as well those happy with Aloe Vera fragrance.
